mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report (reporter_id, reported_id, reported_type, category, reason, status, created_at) VALUES (#{reporterId}, #{reportedId}, #{reportedType}, #{category}, #{reason}, 'PENDING', NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT r.report_id as reportId, r.reporter_id as reporterId, r.reported_id as reportedId, r.reported_type as reportedType, r.category as category, r.reason as reason, r.status as status, r.created_at as createdAt, r.handled_at as handledAt, r.handler_id as handlerId, r.handle_comment as handleComment, u.name as reporterName, COALESCE( u2.name, c.crop_name, fd.title, CONCAT('리뷰 #', rv.review_id), CONCAT('댓글 #', cm.comment_id) ) as reportedTitle, COALESCE( u2.name, cu.name, du.name, ru.name, cmu.name ) as reportedUserName FROM report r LEFT JOIN user u ON r.reporter_id = u.id LEFT JOIN user u2 ON r.reported_type = 'USER' AND r.reported_id = u2.id LEFT JOIN crop c ON r.reported_type = 'CROP' AND r.reported_id = c.crop_id LEFT JOIN user cu ON c.user_id = cu.id LEFT JOIN farmingdiary fd ON r.reported_type = 'DIARY' AND r.reported_id = fd.diary_id LEFT JOIN user du ON fd.user_id = du.id LEFT JOIN review rv ON r.reported_type = 'REVIEW' AND r.reported_id = rv.review_id LEFT JOIN user ru ON rv.user_id = ru.id LEFT JOIN comment cm ON r.reported_type = 'COMMENT' AND r.reported_id = cm.comment_id LEFT JOIN user cmu ON cm.user_id = cmu.id WHERE r.report_id = #{reportId}

SELECT r.*, u.name as reporter_name, CASE WHEN r.reported_type = 'USER' THEN (SELECT name FROM user WHERE id = r.reported_id) WHEN r.reported_type = 'CROP' THEN (SELECT crop_name FROM crop WHERE crop_id = r.reported_id) WHEN r.reported_type = 'DIARY' THEN (SELECT title FROM farmingdiary WHERE diary_id = r.reported_id) WHEN r.reported_type = 'REVIEW' THEN (SELECT CONCAT('리뷰 #', review_id) FROM review WHERE review_id = r.reported_id) WHEN r.reported_type = 'COMMENT' THEN (SELECT CONCAT('댓글 #', comment_id) FROM comment WHERE comment_id = r.reported_id) END as reported_title FROM report r LEFT JOIN user u ON r.reporter_id = u.id ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
